title: What is meant by 'dual use of technology'? - Quora

response.answer_text: dual use technology usually refers to those technologies that are used essentially for some kind of military purposes but are now also harnessed as beneficial to mankind like missile technology.Originally developed for destruction are now used for carrying and space probes into space...or like GPS technology which was originally developed for military purpose but now serves various worldwide applications..

I’ve heard this as an export control term. It means something has both military and civilian uses. An example might be a radar system useful for air traffic control or air search. Such things get more scrutiny than civilian only items, like stuffed animals.
